Call Back Date must be today or a future date.

fields.name: Assisted_Sales_Bill_To_Contact_Check
fields.fieldText: WARNING: Before running the Assisted Sales UI you will need to the following fields to be present on your Bill To Contact: Email, Account, Street, Postcode and Country. The referenced Account should have Billing Country set too.

fields.name: Assisted_Sales_Contact_Check
fields.fieldText: ﻿WARNING: Before running the Assisted Sales UI you will need to the following fields to be present on your Contact: Email, Account, Street, Postcode and Country. The referenced Account should have Billing Country set too. The referenced Account should have Billing Country set too.

fields.name: Assisted_Sales_Locale_Check_Warning
fields.fieldText: WARNING: Before running the Assisted Sales UI you will need a Locale to be set (on Account).

fields.name: Assisted_Sales_User_Check
fields.fieldText: ﻿WARNING: Before running the Assisted Sales UI you will need your Email and Federation Id populated on your User record, as well as membership of one of the Assisted Sales Groups.
